name: 1 vs 20 (#GM20)
description:
Highly addictive and fun gameplay.  Original soundtrack.

Thrown into a pit full of 20 masked psychos - Use RMB for SHIELD, and LMB to shoot.

The enemy will try to GRAB and pin you down, and roast you with their timed explosives!

The shield can protect you and deflect the bombs, but it cannot block the explosion SPLASH damage! Also, while the shield is enabled, you cannot shoot! 

Electrifying powerups will certainly give you something to smile about!

Can you survive the madness?
